com.yworks.yfiles.graph

Interface IPortDefaults

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortDefaults

    public interface IPortDefaults
    Interface used by IGraph to declare and obtain the defaults for ports at nodes and edges.

    Note that changing these defaults does not change properties of already created model items. Rather, only items created after the change are affected.

    See Also:
    IPort, INodeDefaults.getPortDefaults(), IEdgeDefaults.getPortDefaults(), IGraph.getNodeDefaults(), IGraph.getEdgeDefaults()

    • Method Detail

      • getLocationParameter

        IPortLocationModelParameter getLocationParameter()
        Gets the location model parameter to use for ports.

        Depending on the setting of LocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled, the getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner) method should return a clone of this instance or the very same instance.

        Returns:
        The parameter to use as a template.
        See Also:
        isLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled(), getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner), setLocationParameter(IPortLocationModelParameter)

      • getLocationParameterInstance

        IPortLocationModelParameter getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner owner)
        Factory method that returns a location model parameter instance for use with newly created ports.

        Most implementations will yield either, a clone of or the LocationParameter property, if LocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled is enabled, but they might use more complicated logic, too.

        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the port that will be created.
        Returns:
        The parameter to use, which for most implementations is either a clone of or the LocationParameter property, if LocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled is enabled.

      • getStyle

        IPortStyle getStyle()
        Gets the style to use for ports.

        Depending on the setting of StyleInstanceSharingEnabled, the getStyleInstance(IPortOwner) method should return a clone of this instance or the very same instance.

        Returns:
        The style to use as a template.
        See Also:
        isStyleInstanceSharingEnabled(), setStyle(IPortStyle)

      • getStyleInstance

        IPortStyle getStyleInstance(IPortOwner owner)
        Factory method that returns a style instance for use with newly created ports.

        Most implementations will yield either, a clone of or the Style property, if StyleInstanceSharingEnabled is enabled, but they might use more complicated logic, too.

        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the port that will be created.
        Returns:
        The style to use, which for most implementations is either a clone of or the Style property, if StyleInstanceSharingEnabled is enabled.

      • isAutoCleanupEnabled

        boolean isAutoCleanupEnabled()
        Determines whether unused ports should automatically be removed from their owners as soon as no further edge is connected to them.
        Returns:
        The AutoCleanupEnabled.
        See Also:
        IGraph.remove(com.yworks.yfiles.graph.IModelItem), setAutoCleanupEnabled(boolean)

      • isLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled

        boolean isLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled()
        Gets a value indicating whether the LocationParameter instance should be shared referentially or cloned upon a call to getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner).
        Returns:
        true if the reference should be shared; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner), getLocationParameter(), setLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled(boolean)

      • isStyleInstanceSharingEnabled

        boolean isStyleInstanceSharingEnabled()
        Gets a value indicating whether the Style instance should be shared referentially or cloned upon a call to getStyleInstance(IPortOwner).
        Returns:
        true if the reference should be shared; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getStyleInstance(IPortOwner), getStyle(), setStyleInstanceSharingEnabled(boolean)

      • setAutoCleanupEnabled

        void setAutoCleanupEnabled(boolean value)
        Determines whether unused ports should automatically be removed from their owners as soon as no further edge is connected to them.
        Parameters:
        value - The AutoCleanupEnabled to set.
        See Also:
        IGraph.remove(com.yworks.yfiles.graph.IModelItem), isAutoCleanupEnabled()

      • setLocationParameter

        void setLocationParameter(IPortLocationModelParameter value)
        Sets the location model parameter to use for ports.

        Depending on the setting of LocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled, the getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner) method should return a clone of this instance or the very same instance.

        Parameters:
        value - The parameter to use as a template.
        See Also:
        isLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled(), getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner), getLocationParameter()

      • setLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled

        void setLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether the LocationParameter instance should be shared referentially or cloned upon a call to getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner).
        Parameters:
        value - true if the reference should be shared; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getLocationParameterInstance(IPortOwner), getLocationParameter(), isLocationParameterInstanceSharingEnabled()

      • setStyle

        void setStyle(IPortStyle value)
        Sets the style to use for ports.

        Depending on the setting of StyleInstanceSharingEnabled, the getStyleInstance(IPortOwner) method should return a clone of this instance or the very same instance.

        Parameters:
        value - The style to use as a template.
        See Also:
        isStyleInstanceSharingEnabled(), getStyle()

      • setStyleInstanceSharingEnabled

        void setStyleInstanceSharingEnabled(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether the Style instance should be shared referentially or cloned upon a call to getStyleInstance(IPortOwner).
        Parameters:
        value - true if the reference should be shared; false otherwise.
        See Also:
